source_objects.title: Project Management
source_objects.description: Master Project Management with courses on: PMI RMP, PRINCE Foundation certification, software project management, CBAP, project planning and execution.

items.title: Microsoft Project: Project Management-Scheduling & Planning
items.headline: Complete course for project scheduling and planning with MS Project- Become and EXPERT
objectives_summary: Learn project planning and scheduling with Microsoft Project
Learn key project management principals
Create Project and WBS

items.title: 21 Steps to Successful Project Management
items.headline: Utilising good practice while knowing how to avoid common project management mistakes
objectives_summary: The 6 stages of a project
How to define business objectives and benefits
How to plan the project

items.title: PMI-ACP Certification: Initiation and Requirements Gathering
items.headline: Agile Certified Practitioner Certification Program - Course 4 of 8 - Initiation and Requirements Gathering
objectives_summary: Recognize the levels of agile planning, understand the benefits of having a plan for an agile project
Identify activities that take place during the different phases of agile planning
Understand the essential elements of a business case, identify the elements of product vision

items.title: CBAP - IIBA Certified Business Analysis Professional Course
items.headline: CBAP - IIBA Certified Business Analysis Professional Certification Preparation Course
objectives_summary: Business analysis planning and monitoring
Elicitation and collaboration
Requirements life cycle management

items.title: PMI-ACP Certification: Value and Quality in Agile Projects
items.headline: Agile Certified Practitioner Certification Program - Course 8 of 8 - Value and Quality in Agile Projects
objectives_summary: Understand Agile processes
Manage Agile processes
Value driven delivery

items.title: Software Project Management For Start-ups And Solopreneurs

visible_instructors.name: Alex
visible_instructors.job_title: Business, Entrepreneurship, SEO, Marketing, Amazon, YouTube
visible_instructors.title: Alex Genadinik

items.headline: Software project management for start-ups, small business & entrepreneurs using Trello. Especially if hire freelancers.
objectives_summary: Have your products go more smoothly, on time and on budget
Understand different software project management methodologies so you can use the right one for your project
Manage and complete software projects

items.title: Professional Project Management By A Top 1% Project Manager

visible_instructors.job_title: Best Seller Instructor, PMP, Scrum Master, Entrepreneur
visible_instructors.name: Anca
visible_instructors.title: Anca Onuta

items.headline: Project planning, management on time & budget using Trello, Asana, Jira! Prevent scope creep, make correct estimations
objectives_summary: Define and plan your projects to avoid scope creep
Use the power of assumptions when it comes to effort estimations
What aspects of the projects to consider to achieve the project scope

items.title: AgilePM® Project Management Foundation Practice Exam
items.headline: Prepare for your APMG AgilePM®  Project Management Foundation Certification with this mock exam.
objectives_summary: Practice with a real mock-exam that mimics the APMG AgilePM® Foundation exam.
Become familiar with the type of questions you are going to get at the APMG AgilePM® Foundation exam.
Gain insight into which topics you already master which still deserve attention.

items.title: The Complete Agile Course for Absolute Beginners
items.headline: Learn Agile, Principles of Agile Manifesto, Characteristics of Agile, Release Planning, Iteration Planning & more
objectives_summary: Students will be able to Learn Agile
Students will be able to Learn Principle of Manifesto
Students will be able to Learn Characteristics of Agile

items.title: Construction Procurement Management

How to write scope of works, prepare and run tenders and select sub-contractors
